replies.body:
> Corporate Mundo's impact VFX have been restored when **W - Infected Cleaver** successfully hits an enemy target.

Infected Cleaver is his Q
that Mulan reference on xin;s patch though XD
Aside from the Azir changes, this was my favourite part of the whole patch.

Azir gets weaker.

Xin gets stronger.

Cait does more damage.

Vayne buffs.

Veigar buffs.

Bramble Vest nerf.

Assassin item buffs.

___________________

If you liked living, this really isn't the patch for you :S
The most cancer of it all is still the ardent buffs.
I love the new skins thanks for them and I think that my account yol da shl was removed for somereason I made a new account and I cant login on my old one that was removed
I like that Xin's ability descriptions are from I'll Make a Man Out of You from Disney's Mulan. Riot bringin' out the 90's nostalgia.
Beekeeper Singed is the most genius idea for a skin I've ever seen! It's perfect!!
Another yi skin? He just got a freaking epic skin.
Could we maybe get a champ sort alphabetically option in the custom item build section or be able to drag and drop the order like we do with masteries and runes.

I just realised that kayn was nerfed but there was no patch reguarding to it. The nerf was to his w and r ad scaling were reduced , if this is a visual glitch in terms of the numbers please fix it, but if this is a intentional nerf can you make mention of it riot in the patch notes
